mil.nga.giat.geowave.vector.plugin.lock

Interface LockingManagement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.geotools.data.LockingManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLockingManagement, MemoryLockManager

    public interface LockingManagement
extends org.geotools.data.LockingManager
    An extension to LockManager to support requesting a lock on a specific feature under a provided transaction. Implementers must check transaction state as AUTO_COMMIT. Locking under an AUTO_COMMIT is not authorized.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void lock(org.geotools.data.Transaction transaction, String featureID)
      Lock a feature for a provided transaction.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.geotools.data.LockingManager

        exists, lockFeatureID, refresh, release, unLockFeatureID

    • Method Detail

      • lock

        void lock(org.geotools.data.Transaction transaction,
          String featureID)
        Lock a feature for a provided transaction. This is typically used for modifications (updates).
        Parameters:
        transaction -
        featureID -
